description: Trail goes from Spruston Road to Timberland Lake.  It has trail marks indicating it is part of the Trans-Canada Trail.The first 2/3 is along a ridge through a very nice forest. The last 1/3 is along logging roads through a clearcut. (Don't believe the out-of-date imagery from google earth.) The trail ends at the lake where you can picnic and swim.
directions: Turn off the Island Highway onto Spruston Road and watch for signs of trail head opposite a large turnout.
title: Whitepine Trail
